high_signal_items.title: Explainable Patterns in Cryptocurrency Microstructure
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The study identifies stable cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency limit-order-book microstructure, suggesting a portable microstructure representation of short-horizon returns. This could lead to the development of universal feature libraries for crypto markets, enhancing trading strategies.

high_signal_items.title: Generative AI for Stock Selection
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The research demonstrates that generative AI can automate feature discovery in U.S. equities, providing economically motivated features that improve Sharpe ratios. This suggests potential for AI-driven stock selection strategies that reduce manual feature engineering.

high_signal_items.title: A unified theory of order flow, market impact, and volatility
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The paper presents a microstructural model that reconciles empirical properties of financial markets, such as persistent signed order flow and power-law market impact. This could inform the development of more accurate trading algorithms.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Stable cross-asset patterns in crypto microstructure can be exploited for arbitrage opportunities across different cryptocurrencies.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Develop a trading algorithm based on identified microstructure patterns and backtest across multiple cryptocurrencies.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Generative AI can discover novel features that enhance stock selection and improve risk-adjusted returns.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Integrate AI-generated features into a stock selection model and evaluate performance against traditional models.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Understanding the persistence of core order flow can improve predictions of market impact and volatility.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Implement the proposed microstructural model and test its predictive power on market impact and volatility.

new_data_sources.name: Binance Futures Order Book Data
new_data_sources.use_case: Analyzing cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency microstructure for trading strategies.

new_data_sources.name: U.S. Equity Analyst Reports
new_data_sources.use_case: Generating AI-driven features for stock selection models.

new_data_sources.name: Trade Volume Data
new_data_sources.use_case: Developing models for predicting market impact and volatility based on order flow.
